name: joplin
description: Joplin is an open source note taking and to do app with synchronization. It supports markdown, attachments, end to end encryption and tags, and can sync through self hosted backends like WebDAV or Nextcloud for full data ownership.
features: Markdown: Full markdown support, Rich text editor, Code syntax highlighting. Write beautifully.
Encryption: End-to-end encryption, Secure sync, Password protection. Total privacy.
Sync: WebDAV, Nextcloud, Dropbox, OneDrive support. Sync everywhere.
Organization: Notebooks, tags, search, Nested structure. Stay organized.
Attachments: Images, PDFs, files, Inline display. Rich content.
To-Do Lists: Task management, Checkboxes, Due dates. Get things done.
Web Clipper: Browser extension, Save web pages, Simplified view. Capture the web.
Mobile Apps: iOS and Android, Offline access, Full sync. Notes on the go.
Plugins: Extend functionality, Community add-ons, Custom features. Make it yours.
Export: Multiple formats, Backup options, Data portability. Never locked in.
